Class GradoopAccumuloConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.storage.accumulo.config.GradoopAccumuloConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, GradoopStoreConfig

    public class GradoopAccumuloConfig
extends Object
implements GradoopStoreConfig
    Gradoop Accumulo configuration define
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACCUMULO_AUTHORIZATIONS
      accumulo authorizations, default Authorizations.EMPTY
      static String ACCUMULO_INSTANCE
      accumulo instance name, default "gradoop"
      static String ACCUMULO_PASSWD
      accumulo password for accumulo connector, default empty
      static String ACCUMULO_TABLE_PREFIX
      accumulo table prefix, you can define namespace and store prefix here
      static String ACCUMULO_USER
      accumulo user for accumulo connector, default "root"
      static String GRADOOP_BATCH_SCANNER_THREADS
      gradoop batch scanner threads, default 10
      static String GRADOOP_ITERATOR_PRIORITY
      gradoop accumulo iterator priority, default 0xf
      static String ZOOKEEPER_HOSTS
      zookeeper hosts, default "localhost:2181"
